summary: An arena designed for one on one combat, as featured in Youtube\'s \"Skyrim Beast Battle Arena\"
descriptionHtml:
Hey!
Just a quick little mod this as some people have been asking for it. This is the arena I\'ve been using for the Beast Battle Arena series on Youtube. 
It\'s not well made or anything, and when you view it from above there\'s huge gaps missing in the side...
But it shouldn\'t matter too much for any general purposes, and I\'ll be adding a video on here with instructions on how to set up your own battles. 

Feel free to use this for your own battles guys, and hell, upload them to youtube if you want. I would appreciate a link back to my channel if you choose to do that though. Ta! 

HOW TO GET THERE
--------------------------
The video below) will explain everything. But if you want to get to the arena open the console with the ` key and then type coc beastbattlearena

YOUTUBE VIDEO GUIDE
--------------------------
I have no idea how to embed this... 
CURRENTLY PROCESSING : 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BQDl8_64JKg&feature=youtu.be

INSTALLATION 
--------------------------
Download it and install like any other mod. Just drag the file into your data folder, or use Nexus Mod Manager.

The first episode of Skyrim Beast Battle Arena - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=34iDf_-5MRM
My Youtube Channel - http://www.youtube.com/user/ForAdventure?feature=guide
author: Best In Slot
